title: Chat Application
description: Developed a real-time chat application using the MERN stack, offering seamless communication with modern features and Integrated WebSocket (Socket.IO) for instant communication.

title: Weather Application
description: Designed and developed a comprehensive weather application utilizing JavaScript and OpenWeatherMap API to provide users with accurate, real-time weather forecasts for any location.

title: Car Rental System
description: Developed a responsive and scalable car rental system using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack , enabling seamless user experiences for booking and managing car rentals.
